title: Hart of Valley Village 2 bd, 2bath + Den 1300 sf
posting_body: Extra large 2 bd, 2bath apartment with a large den in a quiet 4-unit building.
Recently renovated, new kitchen with granite counters, engineered hard wood floors throughout, lots of storage, walk-in cedar closet in master bedroom, central A/C and heater.
Two parking spaces, one of them inside the attached garage.
Small dog okay with extra deposit.
Applicants must show a copy of last year's tax return, and have a proof of employment.
